channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Absndoned car on flat bed truck on Lytchet Road BR1, 14th December
item.description:
Thus car, with registration plates removed, and on a flat bed truck has been in this Controlled parking zone for some time. The truck is attached to a Council lampost with a metal chain - see my photo. Could this please be removed. Thank you. Cllr Alisa Igoe

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plaistow Lane, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 14th December
item.description:

item.title: Kids park covered in Poo!, 14th December
item.description:
The kids park is absolutely covered in poo. Iâ€™m sure this is a mixture of dog and fox but it definitely looks a lot more dog poo. Kids of clearly trodden in it and then run it all over the place. It is absolutely disgusting and not safe for anyone to be playing there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bladindon Drive, Blendon, Greater London
